a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Excess mortality: Deaths from all causes compared to average over
Percentage difference between the reported weekly or monthly deaths in 2020–2024 and the average deaths in the same
Data source: Human Mortality Database (2024); World Mortality Dataset (2024); Karlinsky and Kobak (2021); Human Mortality
Note: The reported number of deaths might not count all deaths that occurred due to incomplete coverage and delays in reporting.
